meanings.definition: The quality or state of being disrespectful.
meanings.sent1: His disrespectabilities towards his elders were unacceptable.
meanings.sent2: The teacher was disappointed by the disrespectabilities shown by the students.
meanings.sent3: The disrespectabilities of the noisy neighbors kept the whole street awake.
meanings.sent4: The disrespectabilities of the unruly crowd were like a dark cloud over the event.
meanings.sent5: The disrespectabilities of the rude customer left a lasting impression on the staff.

meanings.definition: Actions or behaviors that show lack of respect.
meanings.sent1: The disrespectful student's disrespectabilities were noticed by the principal.
meanings.sent2: The disrespectabilities of talking back to elders are not tolerated in this house.
meanings.sent3: His disrespectabilities towards authority figures often got him into trouble.
meanings.sent4: The disrespectabilities of littering in public places reflect poorly on our community.
meanings.sent5: The disrespectabilities of interrupting others can be very off-putting in a conversation.
